org.apache.accumulo.trace.instrument

Class Tracer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.accumulo.trace.instrument.Tracer

  • public class Tracer
extends Object
    A Tracer provides the implementation for collecting and distributing Spans within a process.
